description: The balances function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
The allowed function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
Integer overflow in transfer function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
Integer overflow in distributeFUD function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
Integer overflow in getEthBalance function allows an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
